---
title: "A Parameterized Report"
output: html_document
params:
  dist: normal
  n: NA
---

A density plot of a random sample of size `r params$n` from a `r params$dist`
 distribution.
 
```{r, echo = FALSE}
x <- switch(params$dist,
            normal = rnorm(params$n),
            "log normal" = rlnorm(params$n)
            )

plot(density(x), main = "")
```
